title: Create image with Midjourney (ver.Short)
original_prompt:
Here are some more examples of Midjourney prompts. 

Prompt 1: conjoined twins attched at the side, dirty, tattered, cinematic light, ultrarealistic, high contrast, hdr, dark rich colors, photography, powerful, stare, weathered face, 30 - megapixel, 4k, 85 - mm - lens, sharp - focus, intricately - detailed, long exposure time, f/ 8, ISO 100, shutter - speed 1/ 125, diffuse - back - lighting, award - winning photograph, facing - camera, High - sharpness, depth - of - field, ultra - detailed photography --ar 3:2 --q 2 --v 5. 
Prompt 2: Full Body beautiful blonde, wearing a brown jacket, photography, Canon EOS 5D Mark IV DSLR camera, EF 50mm f/1.8 STM lens, Resolution 30.4 megapixels, ISO sensitivity: 32,000, Shutter speed 8000 second --ar 9:16 --upbeta --v 5. 
Prompt 3: hasselblad 24mm full body shot photography of gorgeous satisfied looking african woman, detailed natural skin, no makeup, detailed eyes, long dreadlocks --ar 2:3 --q 5 --v 5. 
Prompt 4: Beautiful dark red sunset over the sea shore at night, intricate, amazing, beautiful, realistic, ultra high resolution, wide angle, depth of field, π dynamic lighting --ar 1:2 --v 5 

OK. I want to create image with Midjourney v5. 
I want you to create prompt about {Idea image: living room mockup}.
input1: modern living room mockup with a cozy atmosphere, featuring a large sectional sofa, a stylish coffee table, and a vibrant area rug, natural light streaming through large windows, indoor plants adding a touch of greenery, warm color palette, intricate details in furniture design, high-resolution photography, soft shadows, inviting ambiance, 30-megapixel, 4k, 50mm lens, sharp focus, depth of field, ultra-detailed --ar 16:9 --q 2 --v 5.
input2: contemporary living room mockup showcasing a minimalist design, sleek furniture with clean lines, a statement art piece on the wall, ambient lighting creating a warm glow, large floor-to-ceiling windows with a view of the city skyline, rich textures in fabrics and materials, high dynamic range, ultra-realistic, 30.4 megapixels, Canon EOS R5, EF 24-70mm f/2.8 lens, sharp focus, intricate details, inviting and stylish --ar 3:2 --upbeta --v 5.
input1_ans:
Here’s a refined prompt for your living room mockup image using Midjourney v5:

**Prompt:** modern living room mockup with a cozy atmosphere, featuring a large sectional sofa, a stylish coffee table, and a vibrant area rug, natural light streaming through large windows, indoor plants adding a touch of greenery, warm color palette, intricate details in furniture design, high-resolution photography, soft shadows, inviting ambiance, 30-megapixel, 4k, 50mm lens, sharp focus, depth of field, ultra-detailed --ar 16:9 --q 2 --v 5.

Here’s a refined prompt based on your description:

**Prompt:** Create a modern living room mockup that exudes a cozy atmosphere. The scene should feature a large sectional sofa, a stylish coffee table, and a vibrant area rug. Natural light should stream through large windows, illuminating indoor plants that add a touch of greenery. Use a warm color palette and include intricate details in the furniture design. The photography should be high-resolution (30-megapixel, 4k) with soft shadows and an inviting ambiance. Utilize a 50mm lens for sharp focus and depth of field, ensuring the image is ultra-detailed. 

**Settings:** 
- Aspect Ratio: --ar 16:9 
- Quality: --q 2 
- Version: --v 5
input2_ans:
Here’s a refined prompt for your living room mockup image:

**Prompt:** contemporary living room mockup showcasing a minimalist design, sleek furniture with clean lines, a statement art piece on the wall, ambient lighting creating a warm glow, large floor-to-ceiling windows with a view of the city skyline, rich textures in fabrics and materials, high dynamic range, ultra-realistic, 30.4 megapixels, Canon EOS R5, EF 24-70mm f/2.8 lens, sharp focus, intricate details, inviting and stylish --ar 3:2 --upbeta --v 5.
